page.title: 04FARM LAND
page.content: {LAND SIZES & GROUND The Dunhampton farm covers 1500 acres and the ground is fairly flat with light sandy soil.At Laight's the ground is hilly and has very heavy clay soil.Laight's farm is 500 acres. { CROPS At Sylvester's they can grow corn and also a large amount of fruit and vegetables because the land is light. At Laight's farm they can only grow a few arable crops because the land is too heavy. {ANIMALS} At W.A.Sylvester's farm they have sheep and beef cattle which they raise for meat,but at Laight's Farm there is a Dairy herd.{ {MACHINERY Gt Horton uses contractors for Mowing, Harvesting.At Sylvesters the machinery was all their own. {
